title: Refund and Return Policy
content: We aim to ensure satisfaction with every order. Refunds are processed based on product category and time of reporting.

sections.heading: Refund Eligibility
sections.details: Products can be refunded within 24 hours of purchase. Food items must be unopened and in original packaging. Beverages can be refunded if quality issues are reported within 30 minutes.

sections.heading: Refund Process
sections.details: Contact customer support with your Order ID and reason for the request. Approved refunds are processed to the original payment method within 3-5 business days.

title: Loyalty Program
content: Join our rewards program to save on every sip and bite. Points are valid for 1 year from the date of earning.

sections.heading: Earning Points
sections.details: Earn 10 loyalty points for every ₹100 spent on any order (excluding taxes).

sections.heading: Redemption
sections.details: Redeem 100 points = ₹50 discount. Points can be applied at checkout.

title: Delivery Policy
content: We strive to deliver your coffee hot and your salads fresh. Delivery times may vary based on traffic and weather conditions.

sections.heading: Delivery Fees
sections.details: Free delivery on all orders above ₹500. A standard fee of ₹40 applies to orders below ₹500.

sections.heading: Timings & Tracking
sections.details: Standard delivery within 30-45 minutes. Real-time tracking is available in the app once the rider picks up your order.

title: Food Safety & Quality
content: Your health is our priority. We adhere to FSSAI standards and strict internal hygiene protocols.

sections.heading: Hygiene Protocols
sections.details: All kitchen staff wear mandatory masks, hairnets, and gloves. Temperature checks are conducted daily.

sections.heading: Allergen Information
sections.details: While we take precautions, our kitchen handles nuts, dairy, and gluten. Cross-contamination cannot be 100% ruled out.

title: Privacy Policy
content: We respect your data and strictly limit how it is used. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

sections.heading: Data Collection
sections.details: We collect your name, phone number, and location solely for the purpose of order fulfillment and delivery coordination.
